personal.name: Ricardo Almeida
personal.title: Manager, Data & AI | Smart Products, Automation and Gen AI

hero: I build AI solutions that address real business needs. At PwC Portugal, I lead teams developing intelligent cloud products combining the best of low-code platforms with traditional development.

When I'm not designing cloud architectures or working with LLMs, you'll probably find me reading, taking bookbinding courses, listening to music or rewatching Star Wars (yes, even the prequels). I believe the most interesting solutions emerge from connecting different worlds.
about: I build AI solutions that address real business needs. At PwC Portugal, I lead teams developing intelligent cloud products combining the best of low-code platforms with traditional development.

When I'm not designing cloud architectures or working with LLMs, you'll probably find me reading, taking bookbinding courses, listening to music or rewatching Star Wars (yes, even the prequels). I believe the most interesting solutions emerge from connecting different worlds.

skills.name: AI Solution Architecture
skills.description: Designing end-to-end artificial intelligence solutions to meet business requirements.

skills.name: Cloud Solution Architecture
skills.description: Designing scalable, secure, and resilient cloud-based infrastructure and applications.

skills.name: Power Platform Architecture
skills.description: Architecting business solutions using Microsoft Power Platform components (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, etc.).

skills.name: Product Owner
skills.description: Defining product vision, managing the product backlog, and maximizing the value delivered by the development team.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.description: Planning, executing, monitoring, and closing projects to achieve specific goals within defined constraints.

skills.name: Innovation Management
skills.description: Experience and academic background (ISEG) in managing innovation processes, fostering new ideas, and implementing strategic initiatives within organizations.

skills.name: Communication
skills.description: Proven ability to communicate complex topics effectively, including technical concepts and general business communication.

skills.name: Business Development
skills.description: Experience in identifying new business opportunities, building client relationships, and contributing to growth strategies, particularly related to cloud and consulting solutions.

skills.name: Data Science
skills.description: Foundational knowledge and academic experience (NOVA IMS) in data science principles and techniques, including data analysis, modeling, and interpretation. Complements AI and Data roles.

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: The ability to represent complex data sets graphically to identify trends, patterns, and insights effectively using tools like Power BI to communicate findings clearly and support data-driven decision-making.

skills.name: Agentic AI
skills.description: I design and develop AI systems that can operate autonomously, making decisions and taking actions with minimal human intervention. These systems focus on goal-oriented behavior and can adapt to changing environments, effectively serving as digital assistants that proactively solve problems.

technologies.description: Optimizing large language model outputs by referencing external authoritative knowledge bases before generating responses.

technologies.name: Fine-tuning
technologies.description: Adjusting pre-trained AI models using specific datasets to improve performance for particular tasks.

technologies.name: Agentic AI
technologies.description: Developing AI systems capable of operating independently, making decisions, and performing tasks without direct human intervention.

technologies.name: Containers

technologies.name: RESTful APIs

sectionDescriptions.experience: Over the past few years, I've been building my career in data and AI, focusing on practical, business-oriented solutions that generate real value.
sectionDescriptions.education: My academic background combines business management with specialized training in data science and innovation management.
sectionDescriptions.certifications: I maintain active certifications that demonstrate my commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

experience.title: Product and Cloud Lead - Data & AI team
experience.description: Since January 2024, I have been at the helm of managing, designing, and implementing AI-focused, cloud-based solutions, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and integration of Large Language Models (LLMs), as a leader within PwC Portugal's Data & AI team. Our aim is to deliver top-tier AI-powered products, striking a balance between pro-code and low-code methodologies, and leveraging cloud-based deployment for scalability. I lead a team of experts, setting architectural standards and leading the orchestration of AI automation workflows. My proficiency in Microsoft Azure and Power Platform is crucial for advancing these solutions from concept to worldwide implementation.

experience.title: Cloud and Business Apps Lead - Consulting Solutions team
experience.description: As the Cloud and Business Apps Consulting Lead, I design cutting-edge cloud architectures, having contributed to over 90 opportunities for global partners and clients. I manage a team of specialized technical consultants within a Consulting Solutions team of about 80 professionals.

experience.title: Specialist - Consulting Solutions team
experience.description: As a Microsoft Power Platform specialist, I utilize the full suite of Power Platform tools, from Canvas Apps and Power BI reports to Power Portals/Pages and Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). I integrated these solutions with Azure (e.g., Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (e.g Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse, and SharePoint services. In addition to this expertise, I've successfully led full-stack pro-code app development projects, overseeing them from concept to delivery. Notably, I also earned PwC Portugal's first ever Hackathon as the team leader and technical specialist. This initiative has evolved into a product that we are now beginning to sell worldwide.

experience.title: Podcaster
experience.description: "Mesa do Canto" is a podcast in Portuguese where two friends convene to discuss a variety of subjects, including culture, politics, philosophy, history, economics, and technology. Each episode introduces a new topic, accompanied by a succinct overview of recent news and personal recommendations for media.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: In a team of six, we developed Power Platform solutions for the daily operations of over a thousand employees at a multinational corporation in Portugal. The backoffice was developed on SharePoint, with data migration from an existing database. We utilized low-code development with Power Fx and Canvas Apps, and created Power Automate Flows. I also took on team lead responsibilities and managed the backlog using Azure DevOps.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Software Engineering Talent Community | Full-stack development. Learning on-the-job and working with: - MVC Pattern - C# (ASP.NET) - HTML - Analytics - Reporting - Power BI

experience.title: Consultant
experience.company: SPMS, EPE - Serviços Partilhados do Ministério da Saúde
experience.description: Provided advisory and administrative support to the IT Directors of the Portuguese National Health System; initiated a Sharepoint website project to centralize information on company-wide projects, teams, and project managers; accountable for numerous official internal and external communications to all entities within the Portuguese National Health System; prepared manuals, process documentation, and training materials; compiled reports, Power BI reports, and meeting minutes; led teams and trained new members; managed projects and products; served as a Project Management Officer (PMO); collaborated in a 12-person team.

experience.title: The Career Exploration Years
experience.description: Survived a whirlwind tour through Portugal's service economy - from cold-calling as a telemarketer (REDITUS), folding clothes with surgical precision (ZARA), explaining why wasabi isn't guacamole (Yo! Sushi), and selling suspiciously overpriced hot dogs. Worked in a university call center answering frantic students' questions about campus locations, created marketing materials nobody read at Le Wagon, and participated in organizing festivals and publicity campaigns for Sagres, but ended up doing powerpoints about lemon beer packaging. A character-building odyssey that taught me patience, resilience, and how to smile while a tourist explains that in Portugal it's called a 'galão' not a 'meia de leite'.

education.degree: Post-Graduate, Enterprise Data Science and Analytics
education.description: Advanced program focused on enterprise applications of data science, covering machine learning, big data technologies, data visualization, and business analytics with emphasis on practical applications and case studies.

education.school: ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics & Management
education.degree: Master's degree, Economics and Management of Science, Technology and Innovation
education.thesis: The Role of Strategic Partnerships in the Internationalization of Digital Platforms (grade: 18)
education.description: Interdisciplinary program combining economics, management, and technology studies. Focused on innovation management, technology policy, and the economics of technological change with emphasis on digital transformation strategies.

education.school: ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics & Management
education.description: Comprehensive program covering key areas of business management including accounting, finance, marketing, operations, human resources, and strategic planning with a solid foundation in economics and quantitative methods.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate
certifications.description: Validates expertise in implementing, monitoring, and maintaining Microsoft Azure solutions, including major services related to compute, storage, network, and security.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
certifications.description: Demonstrates advanced expertise in designing and implementing solutions that run on Microsoft Azure, including aspects of compute, network, storage, security and identity.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Validates skills in using cognitive services, machine learning, and knowledge mining to architect and implement Microsoft AI solutions involving natural language processing, speech, computer vision, and conversational AI.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals
certifications.description: Covers basic AI concepts, machine learning workflows, and Microsoft Azure AI services for natural language processing, computer vision, and responsible AI implementation.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
certifications.description: Validates foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure, covering core Azure concepts, services, security, privacy, pricing, and support.

certifications.title: Microsoft Applied Skills: Create and manage automated processes by using Power Automate
certifications.description: Demonstrates skills in creating and managing automated workflows using Microsoft Power Automate, including building flows with various triggers, conditions, and actions to streamline business processes.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Fundamentals
certifications.description: Covers foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure data services, including relational and non-relational data, big data, and analytics.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate
certifications.description: Validates skills in creating custom solutions using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power Virtual Agents, including working with Dataverse, integrations, and development techniques to extend the platform.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Functional Consultant Associate
certifications.description: Demonstrates expertise in implementing solutions that use Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents to analyze requirements and translate business needs into secure, scalable solutions.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Solution Architect Expert
certifications.description: Validates expert-level skills in architecting comprehensive Power Platform solutions that meet business needs, including integration strategies, data models, security, and scalability planning.

certifications.title: PL-600: Microsoft Power Platform Solution Architect
certifications.description: Demonstrates ability to design holistic solutions using the Power Platform to meet business requirements, integrating with external data systems, services, and implementing complex security requirements.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Dynamics 365 Fundamentals (CRM)
certifications.description: Covers foundational understanding of Dynamics 365 customer engagement apps (Sales, Customer Service, Field Service, Marketing) and related Power Platform functionalities.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform App Maker Associate
certifications.description: Validated ability to build apps with Microsoft Power Apps, connect to data sources, model data, create user interfaces, configure business logic, and integrate with other components of the Power Platform.

certifications.title: Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Fundamentals
certifications.description: Demonstrates foundational knowledge of Power Platform capabilities, business value, and basic functionality of Microsoft Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.

certifications.title: Microsoft 365 Certified: Fundamentals
certifications.description: Validates foundational knowledge of cloud services, Microsoft 365 cloud services, SaaS, security, compliance, privacy, and Microsoft 365 pricing and support options.

descriptions.podcast: Mesa do Canto is a Portuguese-language podcast where a friend and I meet to discuss various topics including culture, politics, philosophy, history, economics, and technology.
descriptions.dj: When I play, I like to wander through jazz, African funk, deep, future disco and progressive house, as well as other world music like Hadra/Funk. All my sets are improvised and mix vinyl and digital.
descriptions.playlistsIntro: Music has always been a significant part of my life. These playlists showcase some of my favorite genres, curated over time to create distinct atmospheres.
descriptions.photography: Photography is a hobby that helps me appreciate the world around us. I particularly enjoy capturing the ever-changing moods of the sky, from dramatic sunsets to the interplay of clouds and light.
